snippet: High finance isn't the only industry that's been disenchanting its long-time veterans lately. On Tuesday, a former Google executive posted an essay titled "Why I Left Google." Also on Tuesday, a article by a Yahoo alum appeared on Wired, attacking...
abstract: High finance isn't the only industry that's been disenchanting its long-time veterans lately. On Tuesday, a former Google executive posted an essay titled "Why I Left Google." Also on Tuesday, a article by a Yahoo alum appeared on Wired, attacking recent actions of his former employer.
